mapper.select: select * from monitoring_management where CAST(monitoringManagementId AS char) like '%${booId}%'
mapper.insert: insert into monitoring_management (monitoringManagementId, monitoringTime, monitoringPersonnelId, monitoringLocation, monitoringObject, monitoringIndicatorValues, monitoringDeviceId, monitoringStatus) values(#{monitoringManagementId}, #{monitoringTime}, #{monitoringPersonnelId}, #{monitoringLocation}, #{monitoringObject}, #{monitoringIndicatorValues}, #{monitoringDeviceId}, #{monitoringStatus})
mapper.select: select monitoringStatus from monitoring_management where monitoringObject = #{monitoringObject}
